segments.text: What an absolute mess this kitchen is becoming!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman is still polishing that plate while water floods the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her lack of awareness is truly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! They're so brazen with their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s quite impressive how daring they are, given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's moments away from collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a perfect storm of negligence and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to walk in there and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside just makes the internal chaos seem even more ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who leaves a faucet running like that without a plug?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm almost speechless at the level of obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Despite the danger, the children's teamwork for cookies is a tiny silver lining.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely a kitchen I wouldn't want to be in right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
